title: CryptoGirl7
author: CryptoGirl7
created_time: October 13, 2023, 10:45:51 AMLast edit: October 13, 2023, 11:09:59 AM by CryptoGirl7
content: Have you tried to play favourite games online and pay with your crypto? Our website features only top gaming platforms with fast cryptocurrency transactions and exciting bonuses! Please, describe your impressions of gaming sites with payment in crypto, whether it is easy to withdraw/deposit money into your account, so that we can improve our service.

comments.author: Hispo
comments.body: Quote from: CryptoGirl7 on October 13, 2023, 10:45:51 AMHave you tried to play favourite games online and pay with your crypto? Our website features only top gaming platforms with fast cryptocurrency transactions and exciting bonuses! Please, describe your impressions of gaming sites with payment in crypto, whether it is easy to withdraw/deposit money into your account, so that we can improve our service.Welcome to Bitcointalk. Since this is a thread you specifically opened here in the gambling section of the forum for the sake of advertisement, I believe it would have been appropriate for you to work a bit on a proper ANN and also pay copper membership, so you are able to share images within your posts. Keeping that aside, I would like to ask better your service would me willing to provide to special bonuses for users of this forum or some kind of additional perks for this community. It is a common practice, I think, for new services around here to try to catch our attention by giving some special treat. Anyways, I hope your gambling service goes well. Be aware you also have the option to hire a professional manager here in the forum to help you out with advertisement. Cheers. !

comments.author: Ruttoshi
comments.body: Wow...it is good to see you on this forum, as you are in the right place, because se this is the biggest cryptocurrency community so far. Just like what @Hispo said, you should buy a copper membership. That will enable you to present your casino in a unique way by putting the pictures of the games that you have in your casino. I hope that you would build a good reputation here in the forum, so that you can gain the trust of forum members. It will be nice to see the games in your casino as I will check it out after this post. You are welcome to the forum.

comments.author: seoincorporation
comments.body: Quote from: CryptoGirl7 on October 13, 2023, 10:45:51 AMHave you tried to play favourite games online and pay with your crypto? Our website features only top gaming platforms with fast cryptocurrency transactions and exciting bonuses! Please, describe your impressions of gaming sites with payment in crypto, whether it is easy to withdraw/deposit money into your account, so that we can improve our service.There is a big difference between gaming and gambling... gaming is when you play online games for fun, and gambling is when you place bets. So, your site is about gambling sites, and not about gaming sites.I see is just another affiliate farm, and isn't a bad idea at all, that's a way to get affiliates/referrals, and with the right marketing, you can make some nice profit from it, so, good luck with your project.

comments.author: un_rank
comments.body: No one should take this account serious. The user has made 14 threads advertising a news website predominantly and one or two other services including this one. OP is not looking for community feedback, at least not yet. Be careful of clicking on random links as well.- Jay -

comments.author: crwth
comments.body: Resurrecting threads definitely just means to spam or something. Better be careful with the links posted or something. A proper announcement should suffice and some seriousness on the marketing part in order to be taken seriously.

comments.author: Crypt0Gore
comments.body: Quote from: CryptoGirl7 on October 13, 2023, 10:45:51 AMHave you tried to play your favorite games online and pay with your crypto? Our website features only top gaming platforms with fast cryptocurrency transactions and exciting bonuses! Please, describe your impressions of gaming sites with payment in crypto, whether it is easy to withdraw/deposit money into your account, so that we can improve our service.The websites on your platform are not gaming, they are gambling sites and there is a huge difference between the two, we play games for fun and we place bets on sports and casino games as the act of gambling.The only project that I am familiar with is Wink and you need Tron to gamble on the platform, maybe they have added a few other cryptos I don't know, but as for other platforms I don't know them, and I can't use them either. I would rather bring people to this forum if they are looking out for a new online casino to start using for bets, if it's not advertised through this platform I won't use it, there are so many fake online casinos out there, and one needs to be very careful.

comments.author: Ojima-ojo
comments.body: Do you really mean any serious business if yes then I advice you to put some things in place so that it could aid you in making the right steps as you jurney along and you should also pay attention to all suggestions unless you do not have any good motive for being here in the forum.First you are confusing alot of things because you mentioned cryptocurrency online casinos which to a good extent is a popular payment method to most of the casino's that we have around in the forum, so for that you need to make some clarifications and separations that can put your platform on the top of the demand if there be any competitions for what casino to chose as crypto casinos.

comments.author: bayu7adi
comments.body: Some of the previous posts he made didn't seem to be related to each other... and the most frightening thing was that there were so many outbound links that could have been just used as a marketing account, such as adding backlinks to a website.It's best to wait until there is an explanation from the topic creator so that the discussion that occurs here isn't too strange... because up to now he hasn't replied to several threads he created, meaning he just created a topic without responding to feedback expressed by other users.Besides, the link he mentioned doesn't seem to be his...Quote from: CryptoGirl7 on October 13, 2023, 10:45:51 AMOur website features only top gaming platforms with fast cryptocurrency transactions and exciting bonuses!

comments.author: Slow death
comments.body: Quote from: yojucasino on March 26, 2024, 09:40:20 AMIf you're looking for an online gambling platform in Australia, https://yojucasino.bet/ is a popular choice among users.this is a thread created by another member r this member created this thread last year and disappeared. That's why I advise you to create your own thread to talk about your casino. You said that your casino operates in Australia, but your casino doesn't have any license issued by the Australian government, the only thing I see is talking about the Curacao license, you can see it in this photo:source:  https://yojucasino.bet/Your casino is operating in Australia but does not have a license issued by the Australian government and your casino does not follow the laws of Australia, it is following the laws of Curacao because it has a license from Curacao. Can you explain this? How is it possible for the Australian government to allow your casino to be operated in Australia without a license?To make it clearer, here is what Australia's laws say about gambling:Quote from: https://iclg.com/practice-areas/gambling-laws-and-regulations/australiaOperator Licence: An operator licence is required to conduct the following gambling activities in Australia:casinos;retail wagering (Retail Wagering), under which licence holders (Retail Wagering Licensees) offer: (i) pari-mutuel (totalisator) betting on racing (thoroughbred, harness and greyhound) and some sports; and (ii) fixed-odds betting on racing, virtual/simulated racing, sports and other approved events.Â  With the exception of virtual/simulated racing (which is generally only offered in retail venues, including hotels and clubs), such betting is generally offered at racecourses, retail venues, online and by telephone.Â  The current Victorian Wagering and Betting Licence includes not only wagering and betting, but also the right to conduct a betting exchange (although the licence holder has not elected to do so);lotteries;keno; andinstant lotteries to persons in Australia: These operator licences are all state or territory-based and are typically monopolistic or very limited in numbers.Â  In addition, these licences also commonly have exclusivity periods attached to them.source: https://iclg.com/practice-areas/gambling-laws-and-regulations/australiaQuote from: https://iclg.com/practice-areas/gambling-laws-and-regulations/australiaBookmaker Licence: Aside from Retail Wagering conducted by Retail Wagering Licensees, bookmaking in Australia is only permitted under a sports bookmaker or similar licence, which are commonly issued in the NT (Corporate Bookmaker Licence), or, alternatively, an on-course bookmaker licence issued in a state or territory (On-course Bookmaker Licence) to an individual (or sometimes incorporated) bookmaker licensed by the relevant racing controlling body (On-course Bookmaker).Â  There is no limit on the number of Corporate Bookmaker Licences that may be issued and Corporate Bookmakers are only permitted to operate online and via telephone.Â  By comparison, in a practical sense, there is a limit on the number of On-course Bookmaker Licences that are capable of being issued (based on available stands).Â  On-course Bookmakers can accept bets on-course, as well as over the telephone and via the internet where appropriately licensed. Fantasy sports betting in Australia is typically permitted under a Corporate Bookmaker Licence issued in the NT. source: https://iclg.com/practice-areas/gambling-laws-and-regulations/australiaQuote from: https://iclg.com/practice-areas/gambling-laws-and-regulations/australiaApplication for a Licence and Licence Restrictions2.1 What regulatory licences, permits, authorisations or other official approvals (collectively, âLicencesâ) are required for the lawful offer of the Relevant Products to persons located in your jurisdiction?Casino table gaming and gaming machines, Retail Wagering, lotteries and keno all require an operator licence, which is typically long-dated and is granted by the relevant Australian state or territory.Bookmaking requires a Corporate Bookmaker Licence or an On-course Bookmaker Licence.source: https://iclg.com/practice-areas/gambling-laws-and-regulations/australiaSo this means you need to have a license issued by the Australian government. Another point is that this thread was created by this guy:Name: CryptoGirl7Posts: 15Activity: 15Merit: 0Position: NewbieDate Registered: January 12, 2018, 08:30:07 PMLast Active: October 13, 2023, 11:09:07 AMand the guy disappeared last year and his thread has been inactive since last year, so how did you find this thread?I also saw this casino on the internet: https://yoju.casinothey use this logo:There are many scam accusations against them which can be seen here https://casino.guru/yoju-casino-review#tab=js-tab-reviewsstrangely your casino has the same logo and the same name as the casino I mentioned that is being accused of scam

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: Sorry altgambler; is this a gambling casino or an online gambling casinos rating and review platform? Because visiting the site, it sure looks like a casino rating and review platform, and not an actual gambling casino.Anyways, @op, welcome to the forum, if you have a service to promote here, like a casino or a casino rating and review platform, then I did advice you consider buying yourself a copper membership badge, this will allow you post images even as a newbie, you can find link to the purchase from other user's comment who have mentioned this before meAnd after the above, then proceed to creating a better and a professional Ann thread, this is the only way users on this forum will take you seriously, else, you just might be wasting your time here - sorry to say.
